statements: UPDATE AlgorithmPerformance SET index_used = true WHERE algorithm_id = 1;

UPDATE AlgorithmPerformance SET performance_metric='accuracy', index_used=true WHERE algorithm_id=1;
UPDATE AlgorithmPerformance SET algorithm_name='Random Forest', performance_metric='precision', index_used=false WHERE algorithm_id=2;
